languages.text: "Меня зовут Маражай Эзирраеш. Дракон кабала Опустошительной бури. Первый клинок госпожи Иремерисс. Потрошитель Иллиридоса, Сжигатель Баркагского царства и убийца Карроция Бледного".

traits.locale_text: "Меня зовут Маражай Эзирраеш. Дракон кабала Опустошительной Бури. Первый клинок госпожи Иремерисс. Потрошитель Иллиридоса, Сжигатель Баркагского царства и убийца Карроция Бледного".

languages.text: "My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."
languages.original_text: "Меня зовут Маражай Эзирраеш. Дракон кабала Опустошительной бури. Первый клинок госпожи Иремерисс. Потрошитель Иллиридоса, Сжигатель Баркагского царства и убийца Карроция Бледного".

traits.locale_text: "My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."
"My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."
"My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."
"My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."
"My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."

languages.text: «Me llamo Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracón de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora. Primera espada de Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerador de Illiridos, Llama del Reino de Barkhag y Asesino de Carrocius el Pálido».
languages.original_text: "My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."

traits.locale_text: «Me llamo Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracón de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora. Primera espada de Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerador de Illiridos, Llama del Reino de Barkhag y Asesino de Carrocius el Pálido».

languages.text: “我是玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，狂风阴谋团的裁决官，伊芮梅莉斯女士的首席利刃，伊利多斯的开膛剑，嚎巫王国的怒焰，苍白者卡洛西斯的屠刀。”
languages.original_text: "My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."

traits.locale_text: “我是玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，狂风阴谋团的裁决官，伊芮梅莉斯夫人的首席利刃，伊利多斯的开膛剑，嚎巫王国的怒焰，苍白者卡洛西斯的屠刀。”

languages.text: 「俺の名はマラザイ・アエジレシュ、略奪の嵐の陰謀団の指揮官だ。レディ・イレメリスに命を捧げる忠実な剣。イリリドスのエヴィサレイター、バルカグ王国の炎、青白きカロシウスの殺し屋だ」
languages.original_text: "My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の名はマラザイ・アエジレシュ、略奪の嵐の陰謀団の指揮官だ。レディ・イレメリスに命を捧げる忠実な剣。イリリドスのエヴィサレイター、バルカグ王国の炎、青白きカロシウスの殺し屋だ」

languages.text: "Mein Name ist Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon der Kabale des plündernden Sturms. Erste Klinge von Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator von Illiridos, Lohe des Barkhag-Königreichs und Sieger über Carrocius den Blassen."
languages.original_text: "My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Name ist Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon der Kabale des plündernden Sturms. Erste Klinge von Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator von Illiridos, Lohe des Barkhag-Königreichs und Sieger über Carrocius den Blassen."

languages.original_text: "My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."

languages.text: « Je me nomme Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Je suis le dracon de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, la première lame de dame Yremeryss. On me connaît également comme l'Éventreur d'Illiridos, le Brasier du royaume de Barkhag et le Tueur de Carrocius le Blafard. »
languages.original_text: "My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."

traits.locale_text: « Je me nomme Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Je suis le dracon de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, la première lame de dame Yremeryss. On me connaît également comme l'Éventreur d'Illiridos, le Brasier du royaume de Barkhag et le Tueur de Carrocius le Blafard. »

languages.text: "Adım Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı Drakonu'yum. Leydi Yremeryss'in naçizane yaveriyim. İlliridos'un Karındeşeni, Barkhag Krallığı'nın Alazı, Kansız Carrocious'ın Katili'yim."
languages.original_text: "My name is Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale."

traits.locale_text: "Adım Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'nın Drakon'uyum. Leydi Yremeryss'in naçizane yaveriyim. İlliridos'un Karındeşeni, Barkhag Krallığı'nın Alazı, Kansız Carrocious'ın Katili'yim."
